byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Al Baker, Kim Barker, Nina Bernstein, Russ Buettner, Annie Correal, Adam Goldman, Joseph Goldstein, Elizabeth A. Harris, Sarah Maslin Nir, Noah Remnick, Nate Schweber, Michael Schwirtz and Jessica Silver-Greenberg, and research by Susan C. Beachy.

lead_paragraph: In recent years, some friends of Mr. Rahami, the suspect in the Manhattan and New Jersey bombings, noticed a marked change in his personality and religious devotion.

headline.print_headline: Seeing a Transformation After a Trip Overseas
headline.main: Ahmad Rahami: Fixture in Family’s Business and, Lately, a ‘Completely Different Person’

snippet: In recent years, some friends of Mr. Rahami, the suspect in the Manhattan and New Jersey bombings, noticed a marked change in his personality and religious devotion....
